title: What's for Dinner?
description: Giraffe is hungry, but he is tired of eating leaves. How will Giraffe solve his problem? He decides to try to eat foods other animals eat. Humorous, supportive pictures and repetitive phrases allow early readers to be successful.
meta: bending, delicious, giraffe, hanging, otter, tongue
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
Problem and Solution : Identify the story elements of problem and solution
Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant blend sound /tr/
Consonant Blends : Identify initial consonant blend tr
Quotation Marks : Recognize and locate quotation marks
Alphabetizing : List words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
